episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XII
episodes.plot: A gypsy puts a curse on Homer; The Simpsons' new automated house malfunctions and tries to kill Homer; Bart and Lisa attend a school for wizards.

episodes.title: The Parent Rap
episodes.plot: After Bart takes a joyride in a police car, a judge orders him to be tethered to Homer at all times.

episodes.title: Homer the Moe
episodes.plot: Homer and his friends are forced to drink in the Simpsons' garage after Moe the Bartender renovates his shady bar into a hipster hangout.

episodes.title: A Hunka Hunka Burns in Love
episodes.plot: Mr. Burns falls in love with a younger woman and recruits Homer to help him impress her.

episodes.title: The Blunder Years
episodes.plot: A hypnotist uncovers a traumatic experience from Homer's childhood.

episodes.title: She of Little Faith
episodes.plot: Homer and Bart get careless with a model rocket and accidentally do damage to Springfield's church, but when Mr. Burns offers to commercialize it to repair the destruction, Lisa leaves Christianity behind to become a Buddhist.

episodes.title: Brawl in the Family
episodes.plot: A social services officer brings unity to the Simpson family, but their newfound happiness is threatened when the cocktail waitress Homer married in Vegas shows up at their door.

episodes.title: Sweets and Sour Marge
episodes.plot: Marge rallies for a ban on sugar after Springfield is declared America's fattest city.

episodes.title: Jaws Wired Shut
episodes.plot: Marge can't deal with the quiet after Homer has his jaws wired shut.

episodes.title: Half-Decent Proposal
episodes.plot: Marge's high school sweetheart Artie Ziff returns and offers Homer a million dollars to spend a weekend with Marge.

episodes.title: The Bart Wants What It Wants
episodes.plot: Bart breaks up with his new girlfriend Greta, but gets jealous when she begins dating Milhouse.

episodes.title: The Lastest Gun in the West
episodes.plot: Bart meets a retired cowboy movie star and convinces him to make a comeback on The Krusty the Clown Show.

episodes.title: The Old Man and the Key
episodes.plot: Abe gets his driver's license back to impress a new woman at the retirement home.

episodes.title: Tales from the Public Domain
episodes.plot: Homer reads three stories from an overdue library book, imagining himself as Odysseus, Lisa as Joan of Arc and Bart as Hamlet.

episodes.title: Blame It on Lisa
episodes.plot: Lisa sponsors an orphan in Brazil, and when he goes missing she convinces the family to go to Brazil to find him. While there, Homer is kidnapped.

episodes.title: Weekend at Burnsie's
episodes.plot: After a traumatizing eye injury, Homer becomes a habitual user of medical marijuana.

episodes.title: Gump Roast
episodes.plot: In this clip show, the citizens of Springfield honor Homer Simpsons with a Roast, but the festivities take a turn for the worst when aliens crash it.

episodes.title: I Am Furious Yellow
episodes.plot: Bart's comic about Homer becomes a hit on-line, prompting Homer to attempt to control his anger.

episodes.title: The Sweetest Apu
episodes.plot: Apu's marriage is on the rocks after Manjula finds out he cheated on her.

episodes.title: Little Girl in the Big Ten
episodes.plot: Lisa pretends to be a college student when she befriends two college girls; Bart is forced to live in a plastic bubble after being bit by a mosquito.

episodes.title: The Frying Game
episodes.plot: Homer and Marge find themselves on death row after they are framed for murder.

episodes.title: Papa's Got a Brand New Badge
episodes.plot: Homer becomes chief of police after a scandal forces Wiggum out.
